## HttpsServer class

HTTPS Server implementation using template method pattern 继承BaseServer，只实现HTTPS特定的逻辑

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class HttpsServer extends BaseServer<HttpsServerOptions> 
```
**Extends:** BaseServer&lt;HttpsServerOptions&gt;
